mapper.insert: insert into mid_aks.copy_houseinfo ( sysguid, buycertnos, corpno, projectno, bldno, cellno, floorname, roomno, buynames, address, housetype ) values ( #{param.sysguid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.buycertnos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.corpno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.projectno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.bldno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.cellno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.floorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.roomno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.buynames,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.housetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update mid_aks.copy_houseinfo t set t.buycertnos = #{param.buycertnos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t.corpno = #{param.corpno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t.projectno = #{param.projectno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t.bldno=#{param.bldno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t.cellno=#{param.cellno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t.floorname = #{param.floorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t.roomno = #{param.roomno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t.buynames=#{param.buynames,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t.address= #{param.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t.housetype= #{param.housetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where t.sysguid = #{param.sysguid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select t.sysguid from mid_aks.copy_houseinfo t where t.sysguid = #{param.sysguid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
